attributes.action: Sort out the current state of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well ... where do I start! Just finished watching the news, 3 stroies of stabbings and killing! by (can you guess? GANGS!) Also immigration has reached a ridiculous figure! The population is already rising we don't need forginers adding to that amount! Not to mention how they are taking advantage of the NHS and schooling! The current state of the country is appaling! Is this a world I want my children to grow up in? Judges are to lenient with their sentances ... life should mean LIFE! the death penalty should also come back into force! why should we let our criminals just be locked away! at least America is sorting out overcrowed prisons!
ALL WHO AGREE SIGN BELOW!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
